name: The Purity of a Child's Boredom (Taupsi)
name_original: The Purity of a Child's Boredom (Taupsi)
description:
You play as a child rediscovering the joy of electronic race tracks. 

My unfortunately late entry for Wizard Jam 5. See also the devlog in the Idle Thumbs forums.

All bugs are for free. Especially the spinning cars.
